semanticPatch.suggestedFixDescription: Though windows uses either / or \ as its path separator, only / characters are used by this glob implementation. You must use forward-slashes only in glob expressions. Back-slashes will always be interpreted as escape characters, not path separators.
semanticPatch.unknownAccessPathQuestion: Is this a call to a function from the glob library?
